entries.value: Play
Settings
Quit Game
Volume
Language
Return to Main Menu
My King, my field burned down
It happens sometimes z-
Let's handle it immediately t- z+
My King, there are atheists in the village
Off with their heads x+
We must respect beliefs x- z+
My King, I am very lonely :(
Pick one of my slaves z+ x-
With that face, it's normal :D z-
My King, there are bandits in the forest, they keep raiding our village.
We will raid the bandits' den tonight y- z+
Defend yourselves then, brother z- y+
My King, let's hold a festival in the town square
Let the festival be organized, let the soldiers and people rejoice t- y+
Festival is unnecessary, continue the guard duties t+ z-
My King, as blacksmiths, we request an additional budget for new sword production
Give the money, let the army get stronger t- y+
Make do with the old swords t+
My King, we found buried treasure in the palace garden. The chest is full of gold
We are rich, fill the vault and keep this between us t+
Excellent, distribute it to the poor and needy z+
My King, a famous Saint has come to the city. He could be useful to us.
Let him give a speech to provide resilience to the soldiers y+
He can train our clergy x+
My King, tall bearded men with axes landed on our shores and are chopping people up.
Oh no! z-
Send soldiers immediately y-
My King, a woman in our village gave birth to a two-headed child. There are rumors of a witch in the village.
Find the witch immediately and burn her! x+ z+ y-
Don't believe in such things x-
My King, a merchant brought a potion to clear the weeds in the fields. The farmers are quite impressed by this.
Super, buy it whatever the cost t- z+
It's probably carcinogenic, let's not get involved t+
The priest extended the rituals so much that the congregation is falling asleep. What should we do?
Mr. Priest, shorten that ritual. x- z+
Let him continue, let's count the sleepers as a blessing x+ z-
The soldiers want dessert, the treasurer says 'it's too expensive'
Treasurer allowed the dessert t- y+
Let's give carrots to the soldiers t+ y-
The Agha wants a tax on jokes. He says let's tax anyone who makes a joke
No, freedom of humor is sacred z-
Impose the tax, let the joker think about it z-
The priest rang the morning bell so much that the villagers say 'we thought the apocalypse had come'
Let's reduce the bells x- z+
Ring the bells twice as much, let them get used to it. x+ z-
The soldiers accidentally besieged the forest instead of the enemy
Provide map training y+ t-
Declare the forest guilty, easy job t+
Soldiers accidentally captured the bakery during the exercise.
Correct the exercise. y+ t-
Since they're in, let them bake bread too. z+
Your Majesty... Lights are turning on by themselves in the temple. Could this be a divine sign?
Yes, the gods definitely installed electricity x+
No, put out the candles. We get stuck with the bill t+
The greengrocer banned the scale saying 'Watermelon isn't weighed, it's felt'
Let's buy them a scale z+ t-
Let's legalize the feeling method z-
All soldiers fell asleep at the same time during the guard duty
Let's punish them y-
Let's provide them with strong coffee. t-
Soldiers mistook the 'Stop!' command for 'Shoot!' and broke the door
Train the soldiers y+ t-
Reinforce the door, problem solved t-
We returned from the brink of hell.
God bless you.
That is what a religious man would say
I will have you declared a Saint. Long Live Our King!
I ignored that one, come on
That's a sin, brother
We've become Sodom and Gomorrah.
We will burn in hell.
That's it, keep good relations with the soldier.
Good news, chilling out today too
Long live the supreme commander!!
The army is behind you, my King. Long live!!
Let's do it then.
Ugh, we have work again.
Soldier do this, soldier do that, he got used to it too
The soldier has no strength left to endure.
That's something
The people will not forget this kindness.
Long live our glorious supreme King.
The people call you God King
Come on, was that really necessary?
The people won't like this
Try explaining this to the folks
Even I can't calm the people anymore
We had no money left, this is very good.
Exactly, no need for expense.
Financially we are in good shape, my King.
The vault is full to the brim. We are rich.
At least we still have money
Money is gone
We have very little money left, my King.
You completely emptied the treasury, man!
You need to find reasonable solutions to the villagers' problems. Your decisions might have unexpected consequences. Good luck
Greetings my King, I am your Archbishop. Pleased to meet you.
And I am the one at the head of your Soldiers, my King. It will be a hard day.
I am the Head of the People, my King. I keep the pulse of the public. We will solve the villagers' problems together.
And I am your treasurer, my King. I am tasked with reporting our financial status
Score
A coup happened as a result of your decisions on military matters. You were captured by your soldiers.
The people rebelled because of your decisions. They brought your castle down on your head.
Due to your financial decisions, the kingdom has no money left. You fled to save your life
Your decisions regarding religious matters caused outrage. You were excommunicated and crucified.
